Name: Jar Battlers
About the game: Are you into smash local multiplayers ? Jar Battlers is a game located in a Toriyama-ish retro style pixelated world, where you have to get rid of your opponents using jars, bombs and more, in the numerous arenas of this crazy tournament!! Play from 2 to 4 players with 16 amazing characters to fight each other within 40 fresh looking arenas.. This game is meant to be a funny way to spend time with your homies whenever you want, for a cheap price, as his developer definitely put his soul in it!
